website_summaries.verdict: Best option for gamers who sit far away from the screen, as the wireless receiver transmits up to 39 feet.
pros: Intended for PS4 use, but the headset also comes with a 3.5mm jack to work as a wired headset with PC, Switch, and Xbox One
Despite its heavy-duty appearance, the headset is comfortable and lightweight with an aluminum frame
cons: Some consumers experienced connectivity issues with multiple PCs, so they had to resort to wired use

customer_reviews.title: Great headphones!
customer_reviews.text: Really enjoying these headphones. They are very comfortable and great Quality. They are so much better than the cheap set I had before. I would definitely recommended them. Great for online gaming.
customer_reviews.author: Brad

customer_reviews.title: Wireless functions but cuts out randomly
customer_reviews.text: Wireless functions but cuts out randomly if u play fast paced FPS games u kinda need to have that 3 dimensional sound to hear footsteps so I use them wired they work just fine this way sound quality is not bad it’s pretty immersive and can easily sense what side players are coming from they work fine jus wish they would not cut out wirelessly
customer_reviews.author: Jesse Dirazonian

customer_reviews.title: Quality Headset
customer_reviews.text: This headset doesn't feel like a $60 headset. The ear padding is very comfortable and comparable to a $300 pair of Astros that my husband uses. There is quite a bit of flexibility in the headband. The sound and voice are both really clear. I tested both on discord and Roll20. I can wander around my entire house and not lose connectivity. I have already recommended these to friends.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Its Cloud Alphas little bro !This gets my PPP stamp of approval! PRICE,PERFORMANCE,PLEASURE
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely amazing headset for the price, if looking for a wireless headset for ps4 that doesnt break the bank, is comfortable for hours at a time, and actually is loud enough to enjoy !!! Then this Is my number 1 recommended wireless headset under 60 bucks what a steal!!!
customer_reviews.author: Masta Mulla

customer_reviews.title: Just Wow!!
customer_reviews.text: I cannot believe how awesome this headset is. I didn't want to spend 100+ just for a headset they may not even be that good. After looking at the reviews and that price Wow. The sound is amazing the bass it gives you is 100%. It was also so easy to connect to my laptop wirelessly I am beyond words. Thank you mpow for making an amazing and affordable protect.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: I'm a gamer and I use a headset for work as I call patients. I wanted something wireless with USB, comfortable, and decent quality mic and sound. I think this meets all the criteria so far. The connection seems just fine. My patients state they hear me well. I do use NVIDIA RTX background sound reduction and they cannot hear any background noises at all, but hear me well. It has a great battery life too. I was playing divinity original sin II and the sound seems great to me, though, I am no expert on this. I can also hear my patients very clearly. I'm very happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Anoxinamun

customer_reviews.title: Sound Intermittently Cuts in and Out
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE: The Company shipped me a new pair of headphones. These new ones do not cut out and seem to be working great. I am giving four stars for now and will give five stars if these continue to perform well. Update 2: headset is working fine now and is not giving me any problems. Upgrading this to a five star review. "Unfortunately, the sound keeps cutting in and out and easily gets interference from other devices. I used a logitech headset before this that barely had this problem. I was able to disconnect some devices and make this headset slightly more usable but really cannot stand the constant cutting out."
customer_reviews.author: Samir Hashmi

customer_reviews.title: Great budget wireless headphones
customer_reviews.text: So far it’s really comfortable, a pain to set up at first but it works decently, sometimes it cuts out and when you get to far the audio starts to become distorted, but feels really high quality some things not so much but it’s for 70$ compared to other wireless headsets, doesn’t make a noise when muted or not so that can be a problem sometimes, and mic was a pain to put on, took some wiggling around to get it to fit plus my micro usb charging port was a little bent. These are my first impressions and my review will change in a few months and I’ll see how they old up.
customer_reviews.author: rudy navarro

customer_reviews.title: What year is it
customer_reviews.text: It's 2020, the moon landings were in 1969. My 5 year old Logitech h800 have better battery life and I can charge while using. The poor battery life paired with not being able to charge and use at the same time does not make these $70 headphones
customer_reviews.author: W. Dillardperd

customer_reviews.title: Microphone dead after 1 week
customer_reviews.text: I do not recommend this headset. It worked perfectly for about a week, but within the last couple days my speech was spotty for my friends. Today the microphone is dead. Nothing I do, no settings I fiddle with or anything at all, has fixed it. All settings are the same as yesterday and the computer knows the microphone is there but there is absolutely no sound from my voice. I'd even charged it for a few hours thinking that might be why it's acting this way, but no dice. Save yourself the trouble and look elsewhere for a headset.
customer_reviews.author: JCB

customer_reviews.title: doesn't deserve a review
customer_reviews.text: Stupid headphones have less hearing in left ear I have less hearing in my right but I got this for my girlfriend and she doesn't so she can actually tell it's garbage Also, if you think this review is just me being mad about something, an actual helpful info bit about this is that it completely takes over your volume control on PC Your headset slider maxes everything running to max volume and you have to manually change volume within whichever app This is like your speakers being on full blast and only allowing you to turn your YouTube video down to not blow out your neighbors eardrums Go ahead and buy it if you want to waste your money
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Williamson

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product at an awesome price!
customer_reviews.text: These headphones are very great. I didn't expect it based on the price, but these are great quality headphones at a great price. The leather-like material is soft, fits right over my ears, and leaves just enough of a space where I can wear them for a longs period of time without it hurting at all. The microphone sounds great even when you are using this for work from home (Webex, Teams, Google Meet, etc,.) Very impressed with the build quality and how easy they are to set up.
customer_reviews.author: Miguel Taveras

customer_reviews.title: Impressive for the price.
customer_reviews.text: My son broke his USB dongle for his wireless Corsair Void headset. Unfortunately, Corsair does not sell a replacement dongle and the headset cannot be used without it. Bad on Corsair. So I went searching and come across this headset from MPOW. I've owned several MPOW Bluetooth devices and have been happy with them. So I jumped the gun and bought these for my son. He absolutely loves them. The mic is detachable which is nice. But the best part is that they can be used wirelessly or wired. The sound quality is what you would expect from a gaming headset in this price range. Overall, it's a great product and I would say the best wireless headset sub $100.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Build quality feels good, but the headset sucks
customer_reviews.text: If you are looking for a wireless headset that intermittently disconnects, does not always show it is charging, that sometimes to get the mic to work you have to either a) unplug and plug back in the dongle or b) turn it off and back on through device manager, all while traping in any heat and eventually makes your ears feel uncomfortable, then THIS IS THE HEADSET FOR YOU! I would return it if my room mate hadn't thrown away the packaging. I REALLY wanted to like these too, the construction feels nice but too many issues them.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Randomly Beeps and Drops Audio but Comfy
customer_reviews.text: Edit: A new pair of headphones arrived at my door with a sweet letter and these work great. My friends immediately said I sound better and the noise issue is gone. Still very comfy now even more worth it. These are alright headphones, they are comfortable, but about a week after they arrived the audio started dropping out randomly for 2-4 seconds at a time accompanied by a beep. It even happens when they are plugged in so not due to low battery. They would get higher score without this issue because they’re really comfortable, but when the audio drops in the middle of a game i think about if I spend 20$ more.
customer_reviews.author: Clark

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Value
customer_reviews.text: Great sound quality, and very comfortable! My fiancé got these for gaming with his friends. He has a larger head and they fit him great without squishing his skull. The Bluetooth is also great and has a really good range. He’s able to walk to the next room while wearing them and still be connected with his friends while getting a snack. Noise canceling is also good if that is something you want. He often leaves one ear uncovered when I’m in the same room with him so that I’m still able to get his attention. And the mic can be left off if you don’t need it. Definitely a great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Twinkles

customer_reviews.title: So gorgeous.
customer_reviews.text: The aesthetics alone for the headset makes u wanna buy it instantly. Its so gorgeous and on top of that it works like a charm. The sound quality is very impressive. It's very comfortable and packaged with the mic that can be easily attached or taken off if it's not needed. As a gamer, this makes online gaming communication smooth and seamless.. I'd truly recomend if you are an avid gamer. I'd also recoment to read the manual before setting it up so as to not make any mistakes. Overall I believe for the price, it's well worth it .
customer_reviews.author: NYAKSTAR RAPSTAR

customer_reviews.title: A good conference call set
customer_reviews.text: I might be one of the few non-gamers reviewing this product. I use it daily at my job on conference calls with my team members. The head set is comfortable to wear, no doubt an upgrade from buds. They dont cancel noise but may muffle distant sounds. The microphone sounds great according to my coworkers. Battery lasts all day for 10 hours or more. The bad? -- the wireless dongle and headset briefly lose connection. It happens randomly and results in a loss of audio for 1 to 2 seconds. Pairing the headset to the dongle was frustrating but magically worked after nearly 10 attempts. I'd still recommend it if you dont want to spend $300 on other wireless headsets.
customer_reviews.author: Brad

customer_reviews.title: Great headset at a great price!
customer_reviews.text: I received my headset today, and I'm already in love. The sound quality is really great, and the microphone is not only convenient because of being able to be detached, but it's also amazing quality! I bought this set to teach presentations virtually, I needed over ear headphones for comfort, and needed a good mic for when I recorded meditations for my clients. This set gets it all done, and the price was just right! I haven't tried heavy gaming with these, but based on the performance I've had all day, I have no doubt they'll be great!
customer_reviews.author: Autumn

customer_reviews.title: Great PS4 Wireless Headset
customer_reviews.text: Easy to setup. Just plug the usb dongle to one of the usb ports in your ps4 or pc, then turn on the headset. Pairing should take place automatically. Be aware that you want to push the detachable mic all the way into the left ear cup. It took some force to do so. If you don't, your mic might not work. It is comfortable and looks durable. The mic is clear. Sound quality is not the best, but works well enough for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Starch

customer_reviews.title: Uneccesary On/Off Technology
customer_reviews.text: Do not like the hold down on/off button for 2 secs for headset to be activated; as sometimes it does not connect; just a simple off/on toggle switch would suffice; never understood why electronic makers make all black equipment to include all buttons, switches and nobs; against the background of black headset, one needs a magnifying glass to find and see all control buttons; hell, you even have difficulty in finding USB jack; lasts long time for recharging and are comfortable;
customer_reviews.author: James R. Webb III

customer_reviews.title: Excellent sound and build quality, especially for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Saw other positive reviews, so I decided to give these a try. Definitely happy about the decision. They're comfortable, not too heavy, padding and leather wrapped components are soft, sound quality is surprisingly good, and range is incredible. Friends say I cut out now and then on the mic, but I think I have other interference near my PS4, because when I use this headset with my PC for for work meetings, no one has every mentioned it. I also like that I can wire it in as a passive headset if I want. Solid purchase and am very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Jones

customer_reviews.title: Great for Virtual Conferences
customer_reviews.text: So I picked these up for not only myself but for my hubby too. I used them for a Zoom video conference I had with some ladies and they not only fit comfortably but the quality was super nice! He tried them out for when he is gaming and streaming and said he had no complaints either! I can use it with or without the mic with an extra bonus considering we have a desktop mic already. It was also within my budget considering I can't afford to spend the extra money on the 100+ ones I found so the price is definitely right!
customer_reviews.author: Brandy

customer_reviews.title: Great headset
customer_reviews.text: Was easy to setup. Plug dongle, turn headset on and both mic and sounds worked instantly. Sounds is more on the bass side, but overall good. Microphone surprised me. I expected them to save a bit of money here, but it's very clear. I have yet to test a full battery, but the manual says up to 17hrs at 70%. This is well above what I would be happy with which is around 10 hours. They definitely put the money where it counts. If we take into account that durability is traded for good sound, a great mic, and amazing battery life, there isn't any reason this isn't a 5 star headset at it's price.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Daye

customer_reviews.title: Issues less than 1 month in
customer_reviews.text: Update #2: Wish I could give 0 stars. My audio keeps cutting in and out to the other line. Amazon replaced the item and it is still happening. returning. Update: less than 1 month into use, audio is cutting in and out. My audio so the other person on the other end cannot hear me the entire time I am speaking. I tried to email customer service no response yet. I will try them again. Really disappointing Very comfortable to wear noise cancellation is good customizable mic can be taken off or worn on only thing I wish was that there was an option to wear mic on either side
customer_reviews.author: tjoseph23

customer_reviews.title: Quality build and comfort. Audio isn't the best, but good for the price.
customer_reviews.text: The product is quite good for the price. You get a micro USB charging cable and a very long 3.5mm aux cable if you prefer that. It connects easily and quickly, plug and play. The audio quality is not the best, sometimes sounding muddy. The mic quality is quite good, as is the ability to remove it when not in use. Very comfortable for long periods of use. Battery life is also good, usually lasting me about a day or two when I forget to turn it off. The on headphone sounds (or turning on and off) are no good. They are very loud and sharp.
customer_reviews.author: Jesús Arroyo

customer_reviews.title: my quick review
customer_reviews.text: Pros - call quality is great when using the microphone wire. - the wire is long and tangle free. - comfortable - quick charge Con - call quality when using 2.4G wireless is not good. callers report that I am cutting out and digitized. This is a major con as I wanted to be able to use these wirelessly - there is no battery detector to show when the charge is getting low or how much battery is left. only a light that shows when it is charging and off when complete.
customer_reviews.author: ReneeJoH

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, especially for the price
customer_reviews.text: I hate shopping for certain things, and headsets are one of those things. So many options, and so many reviews to sift through. I'm really glad I picked these. They're comfortable and fit snugly over my ears but aren't so tight that they're uncomfortable. The noise cancelation is really good, the mic is plenty sensitive but doesn't pick up excessive background noise, and the sound quality is really good. I'm really satisfied with the quality of and will be picking up another one for my son's birthday.
customer_reviews.author: Tess

customer_reviews.title: Good for work calls and removing exterior sounds
customer_reviews.text: I needed a headphone for my daughter when we are in noisy environments, but also doubled as a work headset one day a week when I was away from home. They are very comfortable for long periods for my daughter and I. she loves them. As far as me they worked at an above acceptable level for business and teams/zoom calls. I Move around a lot to think and being cordless is a must. I never got a single disconnect while moving around up to 20 feet from my laptop. Absolutely solid in my book for the price point. I have a few MPOW products and MPOW has continued to impress in the quality department for the cost.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Pleased with this Purchase.
customer_reviews.text: I had to replace my old gaming headset and wanted to go wireless gaming. I found this and read the reviews which helped my decision on purchasing. I'm must say i am beyond pleased with this product. The sound quality was much much better then my old pair, the mic is more sensitive so it was picking up sounds in the background but after an adjustment its all set. The range is great, i live in a 2 story and I can grab a glass of water downstairs and still be connected. Easy install and easy to use!
customer_reviews.author: QB

customer_reviews.title: Stay away if you’re on Xbox
customer_reviews.text: First in the description it doesn’t explain that the blue tooth adapter does not work on Xbox Ones. So you have to wire into the controller. Second if you have an older controller you must purchase an audio adapter for you Xbox controller to plug into. Third the sound quality is better, than my cheap Turtle Beach headphones, except I can no longer hear footsteps during game play. I play mostly first person shooters, so hearing footsteps is a huge advantage.
customer_reviews.author: M. Jenkins

customer_reviews.title: Just too dang heavy for me to wear all day at work
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to like these because they seemed very fully functioned, but the weight of the headset was just too much for me to comfortably wear for >6 hours day at work. My intent was to use them all day because I sit in an office with cubicles and typically need some sort of music/sound to drown out background noise so I can focus. I also attend a lot of online meetings, so I planned to use these headphones for that as well. The sound was good, but the headset was just not light enough to be comfortable for all day use. They also feel kind of clunky with the metal frame etc.
customer_reviews.author: JJ

customer_reviews.title: Great Headset
customer_reviews.text: The headset itself is great, has great sound, clear, not too heavy, good noise cancelation. Only thing that makes this headset a pass is the mic bugs out A LOT constantly goes out and constantly stops receiving sound. If they fix that then it's a good headset. Going to try to buy a replacement mouth piece. Update soon UPDATE: Mpow customer service was amazing, called them and they got my replacement shipped ASAP. Turns out its the headset that was malfunctioning. New one works wonders and completely recommended to everyone. Hope this review was helpful!
customer_reviews.author: chris koo

customer_reviews.title: Great for price
customer_reviews.text: The sound quality is very average, but I suspect your paying for all the other practical features. The plug in mic is great, so you can use it as headphones without that feature when desired. It has a cord so you can plug it into a phone or tablet when not using the USB fob, and battery life is good. Also very comfortable and light to wear. My teenage daughter is Minecrafting it up hard-core on these live and wireless! Worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: CocaNilla

customer_reviews.title: Good for home office use!
customer_reviews.text: Nice Headset. I bought this to use with Cisco’s softphone on my laptop. It is perfectly suited to this use. Comfortable with great sound quality. Also it doesn’t interfere with my glasses with soft ear cushions. What I like most is that it requires no drivers or installed programs. You can use the USB dongle by just inserting it (plug n play). Also you can just use the 3.5mm plug (inserts into headset slot when needed). Noise isolation is pretty good as well. And not to mention the excellent build quantity.
customer_reviews.author: Qnumbra

customer_reviews.title: For the price, you can't beat this headset!
customer_reviews.text: This is clearly a look-a-like version to a HyperX headset and coming from a HyperX headset myself, I must say that I am pretty blown away. Sure the buttons on this MPow headset are cheap and the headset as a whole is a little heavier on the head vs a HyperX but performance wise, they are almost identical. Plus they look basically the exactly same! Definitely a great sounding headset. Mic is good. Plus it's wired or wireless which are all bonuses. I won't use it for more than an hour a day (if that) but we'll see how long this bad boy lasts! Nice work MPow.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: These are super comfy. I feel like the price is on point for these, possibly even low for what it is, especially what a high end one would cost you. So the mid-range price is fair. The sound is balanced, I blasted some heavy music and the sound was clear and handled the nuances well. I mainly got these to work from home. I wanted a good headset with a microphone and my computer doesn't allow for Bluetooth headset with microphones or the USB dongle was my only choice. I think I may have gone overboard getting this one lol, but I don't regret it. Will update if need be, but so far I'm so satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Sara Alarcon

customer_reviews.title: I was hoping for more but...
customer_reviews.text: These are a few things that really stood out to me. They are really comfortable. Sound is great. They are rechargeable, but the charge only lasts about an hour, then takes 3-3.5 hours to recharge. The mic works great but if you switch the set off and back on the Playstation3 won't see it. I found if I unplug the mic from the headphones then plug it back in the Playstation3 woll pick it up.
customer_reviews.author: VJ

customer_reviews.title: Headphones look cool but sound cuts off Periodically
customer_reviews.text: Headphones look cool but sound cuts off Periodically. Very frustrating when playing video games or listening to music. At first i thought the batteries were dead but after charging overnight i still seem to have this issue of audio periodically cutting off.
customer_reviews.author: NJogw

customer_reviews.title: Don't wast your time or money
customer_reviews.text: I just received my headset today i was very excited took them out the box set them up to the Playstation 4 the headset sounds terrible very staticy only one ear worked and no one could hear me the mic didn't work this headset is the worst headset I ever purchased and I have purchased a number of headsets over the years this is the first pair that I received that were trash straight out of the box don't waste you time or money i didn't expect this.
customer_reviews.author: DJ solo

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Performance. Well Worth the Price
customer_reviews.text: What's not to like? The sound quality is excellent. Friends and other gamers hear me clearly, with no distortion. The headset charges quickly and the charge lasts longer than any other wireless headset I can remember owning. It is comfortable to use and blocks out external noise very well. I can recommend the headset without reservation. I do have one word of advice for purchasers. Be sure the detachable microphone is firmly seated in its socket on the headset for proper function.
customer_reviews.author: Vrodhogrider

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the price
customer_reviews.text: I gave it 4 stars because I'm a huge audiophile, and over the years I've grown to know what high quality sound equipment is like. These will never touch a set of Studio grade JBL's, but these speakers are definitely good enough. Theyre light and surprisingly bass-y. Easy setup and I'm able to chat and game with my friends now. Just goes to show you don't need to spend 200-400 dollars on some name brand gamer gear nonsense to get something that works!
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good. I have some misgivings.
customer_reviews.text: I am only giving this 4 stars because in the past 2 days it's started to cut out in-between playing audio and it sometimes makes a screeching noise. I'm going to wait and see how they fair later in the month, because I really do like them and would hate to have to buy a different pair. Other than that the sound quality is great, they fit well, feel durable, and they get the job done. That job being wireless so my cats don't prevent me from enjoying my audio.
customer_reviews.author: Michaela-anne James

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: Thought I'd try new headphones and made a mistake with these, unfortunately. They lose connection often (from what seems to be signal interference perhaps?) and do not block out any sounds so I'm listening to computer hums, air conditioning/heater noises etc. along with what I really want to hear. They are fairly comfortable but not like my old Corsairs. I'll dig out my old Corsair headphones and continue with them I guess since Corsair Void's seem to outmatch these in all categories (except price, but even then, it's only a few dollars more).
customer_reviews.author: Angelwing

customer_reviews.title: Constantly beeps, drops connection
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed with this purchase. The headset keeps beeping, automatically shuts off while I'm using it. Has issues working with the Mic in GoTo Meeting... The only pro I can give it is comfort... For beeping tried resetting, no change. Nothing stops it from going to sleep when I am taking online training. Just after about 10 minutes, it sleeps... Horrible operation decisions in design of this product. I would not recommend this product based on this.
customer_reviews.author: A Allord

customer_reviews.title: Very solid wireless/wired headset
customer_reviews.text: Very much exactly what I was looking for. While having to add a USB dongle (since it uses a non-Bluetooth transmission) did add another item to the setup checklist it was super easy to install and get started. Sound quality is fantastic with really solid bass boost so that you get a true reverb feel. Controls are tactile and easy to find while keeping the focus on the screen. The mic being detachable is also fantastic as I can use the set for just listening to music most of the time and only add in the mic when I need to use in game voice chat or Ventrilo. Overall a very solid headset especially at the price.
customer_reviews.author: Gregory R Burnett

customer_reviews.title: Great Option for Older Kids!
customer_reviews.text: We got this set for my 10 year old son, who wanted something to use for both gaming and school. He loved that the microphone was detachable, and the ears were big enough that he could wear the headset with his glasses without issue, but not so big that they swallowed his head and had to be constantly readjusted. We have had several MPOW headphone varieties for different members of the house, and they never disappoint!
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Definitely more for casual listening and gameplay than for intricate music. Good for the price, sturdy, fairly comfortable. A little stiff, and the ear pieces are really large. Not bad for the price point at all. Bought these for my boyfriend to use when I’m sleeping and he has the TV on (we live in a studio). They have been great! He did mention that they are a little uncomfortable after an hour or so of wear.
customer_reviews.author: Nephemia

customer_reviews.title: Very Comfy, feel free to buy it. Seller offered full refund as mine had issues.
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Headphones are really comfortable. Cons: They have this weird lag or signal drop. It just goes blank and then returns itself back on its own.. I am less than 5 ft from the USB transmitter. I hate when they happens in the middle of a dialogue or in the game specially. If this is overlooked then it is worth the money. Update: Replacement had the same issue. Random signal drop. So keeping the same review.
customer_reviews.author: Rahil

customer_reviews.title: Top notch
customer_reviews.text: I can only compare these to the Logitech 935s. For a better price point, these blow those out of the water. Granted, they're slightly heavier but, in my opinion, much more versatile. It's a great plus to have the option to run an aux cord into an Xbox controller or use it on my cell phone. These are worth this dollar amount, and more. These are GREAT headphones. I use them for work and get compliments on the voice quality frequently.
customer_reviews.author: KevLar

customer_reviews.title: Comparable to HyperX Cloud II
customer_reviews.text: I love headphones. I really do. Right next to me at the moment are some Corsair Void Pros (wireless), a pair of wired HyperX Cloud II's, a bluetooth pair of Turtle Beach's, and the Mpow right here. I've gotta say, these headphones might be the king of this price range. They're actually MORE comfortable than my HyperX's, which is something I didn't expect at all. 10/10 so far, I look forward to using them more.
customer_reviews.author: Bryggz

customer_reviews.title: Horrible! Doesn't work. Don't buy!
customer_reviews.text: So I ordered these headphones to use with my Nintendo Switch and at first they seemed to be OK. 30 minutes into playing, the headset cuts out on me. It did that multiple times and then it crashed and sent an error report multiple times and stopped working completely. Then when people would come into the lobby the headphones would stop working and the game would crash. This product does absolutely nothing that it claims to do. Doesn't cancel noise. Mic doesn't work not very comfortable. One of the worst products that I've bought from Amazon. I haven't even owned it for a while day and I'm returning it.
customer_reviews.author: Choplin

customer_reviews.title: Cheap imitation gaming headset
customer_reviews.text: Headset worked right away at first, the audio sounded kinda echo way like in submarine. Next day no audio, needed to reset USB adapter, then I would lose connection to USB at random when using mic. I wouldn't recommend this headset, quality is low, looks like a rushed imitation of a popular model of hyper x (literally the same design and colors). I gave this headset a chance since I own a basic Bluetooth earphones for working out and I never had a issue. I guess they are not ready for gaming standards.
customer_reviews.author: Eric M.

customer_reviews.title: Winner
customer_reviews.text: comfortable! Very good sound quality, good mic and connection. Better than hyper x mix and arctic 7. The wireless hyper x “Cloud” are crap and the blu tooth set, “Mix” doesn’t connect to a PS4 wirelessly. The hyper X had slightly better sound and mic, but with tight fit, no wireless on PS4, and over double the price.... also logitech are very good but a tad heavy. I use them for work.
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Keeps disconnecting
customer_reviews.text: We bought 2 of these for our kids distance learning. 1 pairs Okay and the other headset is constantly disconnecting (using both bluetooth and usb adapter). I wish i could give it 5 stars because one does work just fine but we keep having troubles with the other one. We bought the same color, but distinguish one with a sticker to know who's headset is who's
customer_reviews.author: short E

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work properly....
customer_reviews.text: Bought for a nintendo switch and the mic wasn't working... I could hear what was going on but mic didn't work at all. Seemed like it had to be connected everytime we turned it on too. We never noticed it with our other set since it connected so quickly but this seemed to take so long to locate and such. Just wasn't a good purchase for us. We returned immediately.
customer_reviews.author: Sharlie

customer_reviews.title: Okay, but not great
customer_reviews.text: This is probably the 7th or 8th brand of wireless headphones I've owned. -Good fit, fairly comfortable -Okay battery like, though can't charge and use the headset at the same time(maybe just my headset) -Range for the audio is fine, the range for the microphone is abysmal, anything beyond about 5 feet or with anything blocking the receiver the mic completely cuts out, but not the audio (again might just be my headset). -Lack of USB C sucks Overall it's fine for the price, but not great
customer_reviews.author: Tom G.

customer_reviews.title: Uncomfortable! Don't Recommend!
customer_reviews.text: The sound quality is good, not great. Sounded muffled at times. The sound during a game will cut out intermittently. One thing that stands out is the red flag that they include a card in the headset box that has an Amazon gift card if you leave a positive review. What's that all about? I've never heard of such a thing. Keep your gift card. The removable mic unplugs with effort and some force. Played for a couple hours and my ears hurt from these things. I wouldn't recommend them. P.S. The design is extremely close to the HyperX gaming headset. I would buy from a reputable gaming headset company like HyperX or Turtle Beach.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse V.

customer_reviews.title: Best Headphones for Price!
customer_reviews.text: These headphones are EXACTLY what I'm looking for! I've been playing a lot of FPS (First person shooter) games lately on pc, so I need a lot of COMMUNICATION and great SOUND QUALITY and these headphones do the trick! The microphone is detachable so you can remove it if they get in the way and if you're not using. The microphone only works when you use USB and not while plugged in with its cords. The headset is very comfortable, really nice padding, looks nice and not chunky, and the material is top quality! Lightweight and comfortable! No static noises when I use the mic, and I can hear everything in the game! HIGHLY RECOMMEND!
customer_reviews.author: Victoria

customer_reviews.title: Quality wireless headset for the money
customer_reviews.text: Over all I'm greatly enjoying the headset. SUPER comfortable. The wireless part is Super simple to setup. Good battery life. Mic quality seems good so far. Took off 1 star for two small things. First: sound quality is excellent, good bass, good directional sound...once you adjust the headset for whatever platform your on. Initial setup on ps4 required some fine tuning on the sound. And switching to PC meant I had to readjust them again. Second: there is no headphone disconnect option, you have to remove the bluetooth USB peice to disconnect the headset from whatever platform your using to get regular audio back, which runs the risk of losing it. Overall I'd say they're well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: jlanger

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working....
customer_reviews.text: Was expecting this to last longer than a couple weeks of use.... Bought this for my daughter for her birthday and she used it for maybe two weeks and now no sound will come out light says it's on but can't turn it off, tried on multiple pc's and PS4's as well as wired and wireless and no sound will come out. Was expecting much better for the price, super disapointed.
customer_reviews.author: SweetJB

customer_reviews.title: Just the sound improvement I was hoping for
customer_reviews.text: Bought this on the recommendation of a colleague. Great recommendation! Working really well, great sound quality when on Teams calls which is primary use case. People can hear me well and I can hear them really well. Passing my recommendation on to one and all
customer_reviews.author: Justin Withers

customer_reviews.title: Excellent headset for both gaming and home office use.
customer_reviews.text: Really great headset, and you can’t beat the price! I was looking for an affordable/reliable headset mostly for working at home, and these have the added benefit of being useful for games too! Solid microphone seems to cancel out ambient noise well, and super comfortable on the ears, it’s obviously a large headset, but it’s not heavy or tight on the head. Comfortable to wear for many hours.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Great gaming wireless budget headset !!!
customer_reviews.text: Recieved item with Amazon prime one day delivery and the package came in great shape with sufficient protection for a electronic device. These fit my head perfectly I have a average size head and they also fit my 8 yr olds smaller head very well. The leather feeling ear cups are soft and keep cool as well as isolating outside sounds. The spatial sound was great in the new Call of duty Modern Warfare and was easy to tell which way enemies were shooting and walking from. Music is really clear also and the new NF paid my dues sounds amazing on them !!
customer_reviews.author: Tony R.

customer_reviews.title: Quality is astounding - mic reliability, not so much
customer_reviews.text: Even with the skimpy packaging, the headset itself is well-built. I can tell the moment I had to extend the bands and put it on my ears. The stitching wouldn't fray after years of use, considering that I've done a bit of stitching back in the day. What made me get this was the mic quality - it's just amazing for a wireless gaming headset but what I don't like is how unreliable it is. I get that it may be due to the router being so close to me or having other wireless peripherals but it only happens when I move or shake my head excessively.
customer_reviews.author: Dominic Bernardo

customer_reviews.title: Perfect sound for my PS4 and other devices!
customer_reviews.text: I had purchased a different product from elsewhere claiming to be for my PS4. It did not work. I searched for a wireless headset and located this product. After reading the specs, I made the purchase. This headset is comfortable and works perfectly. The sound is awesome and others are not bothered by the noise, no matter the volume. It works on the PS4, my laptop, and smartphone. The rechargeable battery lasts many hours and I do not have to be close to my device for the sound quality to be perfect. Farthest I have been was 28 feet, but it was 4 rooms away. Will buy again as gifts!
customer_reviews.author: DeAnna Kimbrell

customer_reviews.title: These headphones are garbage
customer_reviews.text: Don't be fooled by the high reviews. I returned my first defective pair and received a second which had the same issues. Constantly disconnects and reconnects. Annoying beeping, cheap feeling quality, sound goes out in the left ear if you set the volumn too low. They're okay low quality headphones. HOWEVER, the fact that they constantly drop both audio and mic connections makes them completely unusable long term. Save yourself some time and money and buy a nicer pair.
customer_reviews.author: Nate H.

customer_reviews.title: Great headset, I can hear a rat squeak
customer_reviews.text: This headset is very nice, the audio is so good I could hear a rat squeak in the game, I could still hear some background noise but the noise was a bit disorientating since it made it seem like when I make a noise it is louder than I think it is. The microphone is a big bonus since my last one was poor and my friends hear me clearly now, by far my favorite feature of the headset is how it is wireless so it doesn't get in the way, I even wore it to the bathroom and behind 2 closed doors I could still hear everything in the game!
customer_reviews.author: Randy Scheiwe

customer_reviews.title: Mic stops working
customer_reviews.text: I loved this headset. The sound quality is stellar and I’m able to tell the direction of footsteps in my first person shooter games. Unfortunately, the mic is a plug in type and after 2 months only works when it takes a notion. I purchased these at $59 and I’d like to say it was money well spent but alas that is NOT the case. I contacted the seller regarding the return/refund policy and after an initial response requesting a copy of my invoice, they have gone radio silent. Looks like I’ll have to go to the manufacturer.
customer_reviews.author: Quickerwitted

customer_reviews.title: Solid Gaming Headset
customer_reviews.text: Great product overall. 1st day of use thoughts... The battery lasted from 11 am to 12 pm with no issues after a full charge. Sound quality is balanced for music, rich middle with solid low end, high end is good. For gaming, solid around, work with your ingame settings to optimize naturally. Ps4 is my system. Easy setup. 1 work around sprung up involving the auto sound channel not switching between the receiver and headset. Press the ps button go to output option and turn on chat only to address. Overall, enjoying. Will update in a week or two. Recommend product.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with these.
customer_reviews.text: Have used these every day for a while now and they have been great. The sound quality has been good The mic comes through clean and clear The wireless range goes across my entire house (2,600 sq ft) without a stutter The battery lasts a long time and gives a warning when it gets low. No complaints
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great range and clear sound quality.
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking for a headset like this. I needed one for my work computer that doesn't allow bluetooth connections and does not allow installation of software. The sound it great. One person complained that I sounded muffled but that was a matter of microphone placement. I moved the mic and the person said "much better".
customer_reviews.author: ROBERT J.

customer_reviews.title: Premium Quality at a Budget Price.
customer_reviews.text: Honestly I was very pleasantly surprised, compared to alot of the other premiumly priced headsets with this headset you get premium Quality for a budget friendly Price Amazing Sound quality and comfortable for hours of play(I play world of Warcraft) definitely would recommend. I still need to test what my mic sounds like but I feel like it should be good as well we shall see.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It’s A No Go :(
customer_reviews.text: I wouldn’t waste your time on this headset if you’re mainly getting it for the wireless connection Feature. I got this for my boyfriend to play online and I used it before I was gonna give it to him and the sound kept cutting out and then gradually getting louder again :( I let it charge and asked him to try them out and they did the same thing for him! His friends can’t hear him well through the microphone either. If you want them for offline usage WITH the aux cord connected they’re okay. Other than that don’t waste your money or time!
customer_reviews.author: kathryn

customer_reviews.title: Excellent customer service
customer_reviews.text: I was first sent a defective model where the mic did not work, but the seller was very responsive and accommodating. They sent me a return label, refunded my money, and even sent me a working replacement that I had not even asked for, which was nice. The headset, now that it works, is pretty good for a budget gaming headset. I would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Niklaus

customer_reviews.title: Don't bother spending that 100
customer_reviews.text: This thing is awesome. Being stuck in house due to the pandemic I'm gaming more (PS4). I'm impressed with the quality. They feel like I should've paid more. The battery life is amazing. I gamed on and off for 7 hr straight. The headphones were turned all the time. I could hear everyone in clear stereo and there were NO DISCONNECTIONS. I might buy another pair for a backup.
customer_reviews.author: H D

customer_reviews.title: Best Bang for your Buck Wireless Gaming Headset
customer_reviews.text: This is an updated review. My first pair seemed to have a rare technical issue. The seller was very patient and understanding, and helped me with a new one. Now that I have this new pair, I can see how great they are. Sound quality is high, especially the bass frequencies (I love my bass). Directional sound is great for my gaming experiences, and the mic quality is that similar to a Hyper X Cloud series headset, which is top-notch in the headset market, in my opinion. This is a must-buy if you are looking for a good wireless gaming headset for a fraction of the price.
customer_reviews.author: Dev

customer_reviews.title: Microphone doesn't work after charging
customer_reviews.text: I found after charging I need to move the wireless dongle to a different USB port in order for the microphone to start working again. This is clearly a driver issue as it still thinks the microphone is there but is unable to communicate with it. As long as I unplug the dongle and plug it in to a different USB port on my computer after charging everything works fine.
customer_reviews.author: Joe M

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Wireless Headset for the Price
customer_reviews.text: I have bought several name brand headsets from Turtle Beaches to Astros you name it and for a wireless headset for $70 you cant beat these. it literally just plugs a USB in the console and its good to go no hassle, Great depth of sound and plenty loud for long seshes. Happy overall and wont be going back to anyone else!
customer_reviews.author: Michael Ferguson

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this headset with the intention on using it for gaming and talking to friends online. Honestly I was a bit skeptical because of the reasonable pricing. Most wireless headsets are far more expensive, and way out of my price range. So when I found this (On sale as well!) I wasn’t expecting something amazing, but boy was I wrong. The headset has a nice solid feel to it. There are aluminum elements that really give it a high quality feel. The sound quality is so good! Better than any headset I’d bought before. The mic is amazing, especially because it’s wireless. Overall I’m really pleased with the feel and quality of this headset and would highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Norah Al-Humoud

customer_reviews.title: Sadly disconnects in game or Discord
customer_reviews.text: This headset disconnects randomly when using Discord or playing a game. It works great when just listening to music and Youtube. I messaged the company days ago on their site and never received a response about it. It doesn't seem to be a PC issue since I have tested it on three different computers with the same problem. I'm sad since I have two wireless earbuds from mpow that work great and I have had no issues with, though I do only use those with my and my SO's phone, not on a computer or laptop. :(
customer_reviews.author: Shayna Quigley

customer_reviews.title: The worse DON'T BUY
customer_reviews.text: I don't want to give them a star but wanted to let everyone know about these. Where do I start..DON'T BUY THESE. Customer service is horrible, ignored. The microphone didn't work, I reach out to customer service they gave me tips to trouble shot and I told them the microphone didn't work then I was was ignored. Save money chose another headset.
customer_reviews.author: CMNH

customer_reviews.title: Headphones are really nice but the mic is crap
customer_reviews.text: I love the headphones. They are super comfortable and do not hurt my head when I wear them. The sound is also great! However... the mic is crap. Everyone in my guild says I cut in and out and I sound like a robot half the time. Hate it that I cannot talk to my friends or tell them something in game that pertains to raid mechanics. :P
customer_reviews.author: Robert Baugh

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Headset!
customer_reviews.text: I picked this up to help eliminate cords around my desk and it was just what I needed. The wireless range is perfect for being able to walk around the house while I listen to Spotify or talk on Discord. It also has built in mute and volume controls so I don't have to be near the computer to adjust sound. Seems to be built very sturdy and also came with a braided aux cable for wired use when needed. Would absolutely by again!
customer_reviews.author: Spaceduckie

customer_reviews.title: Wirelessly on the nintendo switch.
customer_reviews.text: They work on the nintendo switch, wirelessly thru the dock. The mic button, it has a light, apparently the light needs to be ON for the mic to be ON, even tho the button shows a muted mic... We using it mainly for fortnite, and it works nicely for voice chat. They are really soft and comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: slick ix

customer_reviews.title: The headphone works pretty well with minor problems!
customer_reviews.text: I use this Product for gaming purposes like the ps4 or my laptop and it works very well. It is comfortable to wear. The quality of the sound is very good and clean but sometimes(not every time), there is a weird warbling sound that cuts the sound of what I'm playing off for a second before it gets back to normal. As for the noise cancellation, it works very well. The best thing about them is the wireless function. It works just fine as there is no problems with that feature. Overall, the headphones works without any major problems and I'm happy with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Porter

customer_reviews.title: Mic malfunctioning
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my son to use with his PS4. Well let’s just say we went through 2 headsets in one week. The mic stopped working first time and the second time the mic piece was broke upon arrival. What in the world.....very disappointed in this headset and definitely do not recommend it!!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda E

customer_reviews.title: Can't charge and use at the same time.
customer_reviews.text: You can't use while charging. So I used them for work and they are awesome but if they start to die I am screwed. As soon as you plug on the charge cable they shut off. So I can't work until they are charged again. So I have to charge every single night. They also don't have an auto off so they die even if I am not using them and forget to turn them off.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable, especially with my ear piercings, but was very disappointed with the sound quality. Seems like solid construction, bought to use on Xbox One, but Couldn’t get it to connect wirelessly, Not sure if it’s an operator error, the headphones, or the system. But either way, kinda bummed.
customer_reviews.author: benjamin

customer_reviews.title: A very good headset
customer_reviews.text: It might not have the fancy led lights but these headphones do the job well. My voice sounds good and the sound quality is good. They also fit snuggly on my head and cover my ears. The metal is also good because they won't break easily. I definitely recommend especially if you are new to pc and want a good headtset for a good price.
customer_reviews.author: Gaby

customer_reviews.title: Mine came without the wireless adapter =(
customer_reviews.text: 5 stars just because, I love this headset, sound quality is great and they are sooo comfortable. However in the packing list it says it should have come with a wireless adapter. Mine did NOT come with that at all. Which was upsetting because if I wanted a wired set I would have spent less money.
customer_reviews.author: iinkredible

customer_reviews.title: Good headset for work
customer_reviews.text: Originally purchased headset for work and works quite well. It blocks out virtually all background noise so I can focus in on the conversation when in meetings. The headset is also very comfortable for a long period of time. One of the downsides noticed was the sound is different based on device; that is, a laptop seems to have a better range, quality, and higher volume than a mobile phone. Additionally, even though the power button works in 1 click to turn the headset on, it takes a number of attempts to turn them off. Overall, I am pleased with the purchase. Thanks much.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Waste of $70!!!!
customer_reviews.text: We have had our headset since July 22, 2020. Worked well for A few weeks but after that the mic started to go out and it doesn’t last for 17 hours like it says on the box, was fully charge and lasted about an hour. I now have to buy a new headset. $70 down the drain! I do NOT recommend these!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: My son like it for the nintendo switch
customer_reviews.text: Works wirelessly for pc and wired for Nintendo Switch. Wish it worked wirelessly for chat on the switch. When using wireless audio comes through the headset but the mic doesn't work on the Nintendo Switch. Hopefully there is an update in the future to allow it to work fully. Sound quality is excellent, like the volume adjustment on the headphones. Feels well built soft cushions on the ear pads.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew T. Shircel

customer_reviews.title: Super comfy headphones
customer_reviews.text: These headphones are so comfortable! I can wear them for hours nonproblem. They have really good sound quality and mic quality. The only thing that bothers me is the mic doesn't fold out of the way when you don't need it. But that's such a small thing that I wouldn't even remove a star for it.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Sawyer

customer_reviews.title: Very good I recommend it
customer_reviews.text: This product is very good for the price only downfall is the microphone does not have background noise cancellation so if someone is talking in the background everyone can hear at that you're playing with other than that sound quality I give a 5 star but the microphone is part of the sound quality so it got it 3 because my friends were saying they can hear my wife in the kitchen making food
customer_reviews.author: charles conger

customer_reviews.title: it can be connected through AUX cable or with a wireless USB
customer_reviews.text: I have returned a lot of headphones in the past month trying to find the perfect wireless headphones for PC and PS4. And finally found it! This can noise cancel your surroundings and has no echo when playing games and also can be connected to any platform like Xbox,ps4, and PC, and has a detachable mic which is helpful. I would recommend this to any person or gamer.
customer_reviews.author: Zarema

customer_reviews.title: Great Wireless Headset, Good Lifespan & Great Sound Quality
customer_reviews.text: Fits very comfortably over the ear, encompassing it entirely without pinching. The adjustable band is lightweight and very comfortable, so altogether it does not dig into the top of my head or put pressure on my ears. Installation was easy and convenient. Once charged, setup was very quick and I was able to jump straight into gaming. Sound quality is very high and clear, and does an amazing job of blocking out other noises. Voice quality is also very good, and very consistent as long as I remain in the same room as my computer.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Breaux

customer_reviews.title: Quality comfortable headset
customer_reviews.text: This is a very comfortable headset, I've used a bunch of different headsets over the years wearing them for extended periods of time. The MPOW headset is one of the most comfortable to wear for extended time periods. The sound quality is excellent with a strong bass. The bass/treble cannot be adjusted directly on the headset, but a simple graphic equalizer software on the computer lets you adjust the balance of the headset to choice. Communication with the 2.4Hz signal is excellent, walking about or crossing to another area of the room doesn't change the quality of the sound or cause any connection problems. Battery life is good, able to operate for a full day on the battery.
customer_reviews.author: Adam P.

customer_reviews.title: Great headphones for PS4
customer_reviews.text: These are great gaming headphone and a excellent replacement for my official PlayStation 4 Gold wireless headphones. The sound quality is great, noise cancellation is also very good. Others can hear me on the chat just fine with no problems. The range is also excellent. I can walk clear across my house and still hear just fine, where my other PS4 headphones would cut out. These are definitely a solid product.
customer_reviews.author: Ronin2490

product_meta.title: Mpow Air Wireless Gaming Headset - PS4 Headset with Double Chamber Drivers, Detachable Noise Cancelling Microphone, Memory Foam Gaming Headphone
product_meta.description:
Color:RedMpow Air 2.4Ghz Wireless Gaming Headset escapes the limits of cable connections and offers immersive gaming audio

➤Gaming-grade 2.4GHz wireless connection via USB dongle with a range of up to 39 feets 
that can be enjoyed uninterrupted for up to 17 hours (at 70% headset volume)

➤One wireless headset for your PC, PS4, PS4 Pro and Mac gaming needs
Or connect via the included cable to any devices that support a 3.5mm connection

➤Mpow gaming headset provides premium 50mm dynamic audio driver combined with 2 separate chambers. 
Immerse yourself in the 360-degree full range sound field

➤Detachable microphone with noise cancellation
Plug in to communicate with your team,or detach to relax with music

➤Lightweight aluminum body
The aluminum casing keeps the keyboard structurally sound and stable

➤Comfort and stability
The hybrid of soft memory foam for comfort, leather head beam and sturdy aluminum frame for stability

Notes:
1. Extra Microsoft adapter (Not Included) is needed when connect with old version Xbox One controller.
2. Wireless Compatible only with PC,Mac,PS4,Nintendo.
3. 2.4 GHz wireless connection is not bluetooth connectivity.
4.Microphone can not use when connect to the Some PC in wired mode.May require a 3.5mm 4-pole to mic/stereo splitter adapter(not included).
5.Nintendo Switch（Handheld Mode requires Type-C to USB adapter (not included).

Specification:
【1】Speaker size: 50mm
【2】Sensivitity: 100+/-3dB
【3】Frequency range: 20 Hz-20KHz
【4】Microphone: 6.0x 5.0mm
【5】Microphone sensitivity: -38+/-3dB
【6】Directionality: omni-directional
【7】Connection Type：USB Dongle for 2.4GHz Wireless and 3.5mm 
【8】Connection Range：39 feet
【9】Charging Time：2 hours
【10】Battery Life：17hours+
【11】Cable length: 2.2M +/-0.15
【12】Wireless System support: PC, Nintendo,PS4, PS4 Pro and MAC.
【13】Wired System support: Any devices that support a 3.5mm connection

◆ Package Contents:◆
1 x Mpow wireless headset
1 x USB dongle
1 x 3.5 mm connection
1 x USB charging cable
feature_bullets: Attribute value change to:Ultimate In-game Sounds - Get immersed in 3D audio experience provided by 2 double chamber drivers and 50mm driver.Hear every sound all over the game

2.4GHz Wireless Connection - Wireless Connection with PS4 PC. Wired compatibility via 3.5mm cable with PC, PS4, Xbox One, Nintendo Switch, and mobile devices.(May require Xbox Wired Adapter for Windows (not included)
Detachable Noise - Cancelling Mic-Mpow Air I wireless headset delivers crystal-clear vocal team communications and noise cancellation
Comfortable and Durable - The memory foam oval ear-pads and padded leatherette headband for comfort, lightweight aluminum allow you can enjoy for hours
All Day Ready To Play - 17 hours battery life allow you play for even longest gaming sessions

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars1,695 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
specifications.Pricing: The strikethrough price is the List Price. Savings represents a discount off the List Price.
